title: Home
text:
Welcome
Hi, I’m Rose McDonald — a conservation ecologist and pollinator enthusiast.
I study how to improve pollinator habitats in managed landscapes.



Bees


This site shares my work, services, and portfolio.

title: Services
text:
Services
I offer expertise in:

Pollinator habitat restoration
Ecological data analysis (R, Python, GIS)
Scientific writing and communication
Public talks and outreach

For inquiries, see the Contact page.
